p: In addition to Pakistan, there are other possible routes of virus entry to the country. According to the Department of Arboviruses and Viral Hemorrhagic Fevers at Pasteur Institute of Iran (National Reference Laboratory), the first case of CHIK was imported from India in September 2016 (unpublished data). Moreover, numerous imported cases of Dengue are recorded returning from Southeast Asian countries. Therefore, informing tourists and travelers to endemic countries to take precautions such as using insect repellents, wearing long-sleeved cloths, and using mosquito nets can play a significant role in reducing the number of infections.
